description: This file defines marshmallow schemas for note objects, including schemas for viewing, creating, and updating notes.

classes.name: NoteSchema
classes.description: Schema for a Note object, used to serialize and deserialize note data.

classes.name: NoteCreateSchema
classes.description: Schema used when creating a new note, validating input data.

classes.name: NoteUpdateSchema
classes.description: Schema used when updating an existing note, validating input data.

methods.name: NoteSchema
methods.description: Defines the schema for a note with id, title, and content.

methods.name: NoteCreateSchema
methods.description: Defines the schema for creating a note with title and content.

methods.name: NoteUpdateSchema
methods.description: Defines the schema for updating a note with title and content.

ctags.name: content
ctags.pattern: /^    content = fields.Str(required=True, description="The content of the note")$/

ctags.name: content
ctags.pattern: /^    content = fields.Str(required=True, description="The content of the note")$/

ctags.name: content
ctags.pattern: /^    content = fields.Str(required=True, description="The updated content of the note")$/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    id = fields.Int(dump_only=True, description="The unique identifier for a note")$/

ctags.name: title
ctags.pattern: /^    title = fields.Str(required=True, description="The title of the note")$/

ctags.name: title
ctags.pattern: /^    title = fields.Str(required=True, description="The title of the note")$/

ctags.name: title
ctags.pattern: /^    title = fields.Str(required=True, description="The updated title of the note")$/

fields.name: content = fields.Str(required=True, description="The content of the note")
content = fields.Str(required=True, description="The updated content of the note")
id = fields.Int(dump_only=True, description="The unique identifier for a note")
title = fields.Str(required=True, description="The title of the note")
title = fields.Str(required=True, description="The updated title of the note")
